Articles.Content: Hmm, I think merely updating firespitter does the trick, the compartments work fine, doors work, and they shield item within!!
Hows this on 0.23 compatabilityness?

Hows this on 0.23 compatabilityness?

Nothke didn't upload yet with new firespitter plugin which is needed to be updated for the doors to work. Just download Firespitter and replace the .dll included in the 6s Service compartment mod and replace it with the one you find in the firespitter download

Hah, there actually is nothing to update =) The new FAR automatically shields anything inside, and the bay opening action group is now blocked (although it shows in action group menu, it is not functional in flight). The only thing I need is to bundle it with latest Firespitter =)

EDIT: OK, it's updated now with new FS version, check on Spaceport

Changelog:

v1.1
- added new Firespitter version
- FAR now shields everything inside
- bay opening action group is now not functional (although it appears in menu)

Edited December 18, 2013 by nothke

Hah, there actually is nothing to update =) The new FAR automatically shields anything inside, and the bay opening action group is now blocked (although it shows in action group menu, it is not functional in flight). The only thing I need is to bundle it with latest Firespitter =)

I get 

Not allowed file type.

when I try to download. Yet it let you upload it. But not me download it?

No wonder the guy who wrote spaceport was let go.
Not allowed file type

EDIT: OK, it's updated now with new FS version, check on Spaceport

Spaceport is giving a "Not allowed file type." error on trying to download it. Does it need to be a zip rather than rar?

Edit: I got SO ninjaed dammit.
I'm getting the same issue.

Ninja of a Ninja of a Ninja!

It seems that was quick.
Dammit, Nothke! Stop breaking SpacePort! It's flimsy enough as it is!
AI cannot dunlooad AAAAHH

Here's what I got when I tried to download it....

Not allowed file type.

For those frustrated by the unfortunate shortcomings of Spaceport and unable to download the update, note that the only change is the updated Firespitter plugin dll, which is available in Snjo's Firespitter pack - see http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24551-Firespitter-propeller-plane-and-helicopter-parts-v6-0-%28December-17th%29-for-KSP-0-23?p=302582&viewfull=1#post302582 - so if you already have the previous version of the service compartment, all you need to update is the firespitter.dll from there.

6sSerCom_v1.1_byNothke.rar

Maybe change the 1.1 to 1_1 in the upload file.

6sSerCom_v1.1_byNothke.rar

Maybe change the 1.1 to 1_1 in the upload file.

No, it's just that SpacePort doesn't like .zip files...

No, it's just that SpacePort doesn't like .zip files...

That's can't be right. Just about every file I've ever downloaded from SpacePort has been a .zip.

That's can't be right. Just about every file I've ever downloaded from SpacePort has been a .zip.

I think he meant .rar files.

I would love to grab this and try it out but Spaceport won't give me the file!

Any way we could get a copy posted to a dropbox or something?

Edited December 18, 2013 by nebuchadnezzar
Or just repack it as a zip for spaceport

For the benefit of the impatient who can't wait a few hours until nothke returns and fixes the spaceport issue, and don't want to download the full firespitter pack, I've replaced the outdated dll in the previous release archive and placed it here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ms3ty01oas4a1fb/uploads-2013-12-6sSerCom_byNothke.zip I'll remove it tomorrow when the spaceport link has been fixed.

You can use the same starport for the download, you just need to know how wordpress works

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/6sSerCom_v1.1_byNothke.rar
